mapper.select: SELECT accident_history_accident_date FROM accident_history WHERE accident_history_taxi_idx = #{param1} ORDER BY accident_history_accident_date ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accident_history(accident_history_taxi_idx, accident_history_driver_id, accident_history_accident_date, accident_history_description, accident_history_location, accident_history_is_at_fault) VALUES (#{accident_history_taxi_idx}, #{accident_history_driver_id}, #{accident_history_accident_date}, #{accident_history_description}, #{accident_history_location}, #{accident_history_is_at_fault})
mapper.select: SELECT accident_history_idx, (SELECT t.taxi_license_plate FROM taxi t WHERE t.taxi_idx = a.accident_history_taxi_idx) AS accident_history_taxi_license_plate, (SELECT d.driver_name FROM driver d WHERE d.driver_idx = a.accident_history_driver_id) AS accident_history_driver_name, accident_history_accident_date, accident_history_description, accident_history_location, accident_history_is_at_fault FROM accident_history a WHERE accident_history_idx = ${param1}
